name: Find the Edge
description:
Get aboard this adventure with only one goal, finding Earths Edge!!!!

We all know Earth is Flat so it must have an edge right? We believe as long as you go east eventually you will find it!

Credits:

Art - Eduardo Petrópolis

Code - Cazuza Barberino

Sound - Tulio Braz

Game made in a week for Community Game Jam!

Made in Brazil!
